title: I WANT HELP WITH PLAYING RENGAR IN JUNGLE PLEASE HELP!!!!!
body: I want to get really good at playing my Rengar in Jungle but i am just no good please help!

replies.body:
i'd watch a few matches of this guy

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Rengar07

or this guy

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Fried%20Bacon

both are quite good at rengar, both in lane and in the jungle.

also if your after some jungler tips i'd recomend checking this guy out

https://www.youtube.com/user/foxdropLoL

he gives you  **A TON OF USEFUL TIPS!**

good luck :)

I've seen atleast 4 or 5 Rengar's die to their jungle recently because they try to do too many camps early when Rengar is pretty crap at clearing.

Start Krugs with a leash, smite them (early) for the "stun"
Do red buff
do wolves (smite them) - the wolf ward will watch your blue while you back
Recall
get your blue
gank

Not sure what Rengar levels in terms of skills anymore since the jungle changed. Used to be R-Q-E-W

Start Q-W-E
Thank u this is very helpful!
